animals.name: Scrabble
animals.profile: Scrabble is as friendly as he is fluffy. He will follow you everywhere you go, he talks a lot and he’s keen to rub noses at any given opportunity! As long as you have a steady supply of dreamies and lick-e-lix you are guaranteed a friend for life!

animals.name: Kevin
animals.profile: If you want to feel loved in an obsessive, stalker all consuming way than Kevin is the dog for you. Have company everywhere you go, long walks in the hillsides, gardening, afternoon jigsaws or going to the bathroom, you'll never be alone. He is an all seasoned dog, getting you out for walks in all weathers but makes sure to cuddle you on the couch when you are slowly defrosting by the fire. He is all love and is ready to be your bestest best friend you'll ever have, adopted today!

animals.name: Phil
animals.profile: I'm a champion fly-hunter and ear lobe connoisseur. I'm a pro at hugs and have an unhealthy obsession with scratch posts. Say goodbye to flies, but your ears might never be the same again!

animals.name: Lil
animals.profile: Adventurous and chatty with tiny paws, I'm the perfect mix of clumsy and graceful. Can't resist a good floor slide. Adopt me for endless fun and laughter!

animals.name: Benito
animals.profile: Do you have snacks that I could also have? Do you have body heat that I could steal? Are you going somewhere without me? Eat, sleep, walk, stay warm …that’s the Benito code. Has yet to see anything that that can’t be attempted to be eaten. Has yet to see another dog that can’t be barked at. Has yet to see a couch that can’t be snoozed in. Likes: Toast, Cheese, Getting tucked in under a blanket Dislikes: Squirrels & that jerk dog Tilly from next door.
